items.sentence: Tom should be able to handle this without any help.
I\'ve actually been thinking about quitting lately.
Tom quickly opened the drawer and pulled out a gun.
Tom stopped crying as soon as he saw Mary and John.
Silence can be misinterpreted, but never misquoted.
Are you sure you can\'t buy one of those in Boston?
Aren\'t you convinced Tom was the one who did that?
Aren\'t you going to vote in the upcoming election?
Tom got his girlfriend\'s name tattooed on his arm.
I don\'t know when the exam is. It may be tomorrow.
